## Mariam
Hormonal Contraceptives: Change 1.0 and 0.0 to yes and no. 
```{r}
data <- data %>%
  mutate(Hormonal.Contraceptives = case_when(
    Hormonal.Contraceptives == "1.0" ~ "yes",
    Hormonal.Contraceptives == "0.0" ~ "no"))
```
